description: Painter comes with various features to assist you in illustrating artwork and editing digital photographs. When you have tasks or functions you apply often, such as applying a pattern to an image or adding multiple shapes to a canvas, you can save them as a Painter script (saved as a .TXT file). Then, you can export a collection of scripts as a SCRIPTLIBRARY file.
You can access a library of scripts through the "Scripts" panel in Painter. To access the scripts, select Window â†’ Scripts .
NOTE: Corel replaced the .SCRIPTS format with the SCRIPTLIBRARY format.
